title: Sphere released from rest near sheet of charge

content.prompt: A small sphere of mass m and charge –q is released from rest at point T. If the electric potentials at points S and T are VS and VT, respectively, what is the speed of the sphere when it reaches point S? Ignore the effects of gravity.

choices.label: 2 q m ( V S + V T ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42E6@

4 q m ( V S + V T ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42E8@

q 2 m ( V S − V T ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@432B@

q 2 m ( V S + V T ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4320@

2 q m ( V S − V T ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@432B@

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
